Request Header: Create Azure Blob Storage

Request Name: my-test-blob-storage

Request Config:

```json
[CONFIG_BEGIN]
{
 "resource_group" : "test_resource_group",
 "storage_account_name" : "test_storage_account",
 "region" : "EastUS"
}
[CONFIG_END]
```

Note: Do not remove the markers as it will fail the request. Add any additional information below.
